dict.acceptation: 旅行，旅程行期；历程，过程；

sent.orig: Please follow these rules to make the journey of your life a journey of joy!
sent.trans: 那就请你遵循这些原则，让你的生活旅途充满欢乐吧。

sent.orig: Indeed, a journey through Cairo is a journey through time.
sent.trans: 的的确确，穿越开罗的旅行就是一次穿越时空的旅程。

sent.orig: YOu knew the journey isnt smooth, would you continue ur journey?
sent.trans: 明知前路崎岖不平，一个人还是要继续他的旅程吗？

sent.orig: The journey from our town to the metropolis was a journey of about five hours.
sent.trans: 从我们镇上到京城，大概是五小时旅程。

sent.orig: As the thought-form of fission dissipates, a new journey emerges the return journey the Tao within.
sent.trans: 当核裂变的思想形态被驱散，一条回家到内在道的道路就得以浮现。
